statements: SELECT * FROM literature_review ORDER BY author ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, title, publication_year FROM literature_review WHERE publication_year > 2010;
SELECT title, author FROM literature_review WHERE author LIKE '%Johnson%';
SELECT * FROM literature_review WHERE id = 3;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS num_reviews FROM literature_review GROUP BY author ORDER BY num_reviews DESC;
SELECT title, author, publication_year FROM literature_review WHERE publication_year > 2000 ORDER BY publication_year DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM literature_review WHERE author LIKE '%John%' AND publication_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, title, abstract FROM literature_review WHERE title LIKE '%data%' AND author = 'Smith' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, title, author, publication_year FROM literature_review WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) OR author = 'Brown' ORDER BY publication_year DESC, author ASC;
SELECT id, title, publication_year FROM literature_review WHERE publication_year < 2005 AND title NOT LIKE '%computer%' AND author <> 'Johnson' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_title, author_name, published_year FROM literature_sources;
SELECT * FROM literature_sources WHERE author_name='John Doe';
SELECT source_title, published_year FROM literature_sources WHERE published_year > 2000 ORDER BY published_year ASC;
SELECT source_id, source_title, author_name, source_type FROM literature_sources WHERE source_type='Book';
SELECT source_title, author_name, published_year FROM literature_sources WHERE published_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY published_year DESC;
SELECT source_title, author_name, published_year FROM literature_sources WHERE published_year > 2000 ORDER BY published_year DESC;

SELECT source_title, author_name, comment_text FROM literature_sources INNER JOIN review_comments ON literature_sources.source_id = review_comments.source_id WHERE review_comments.reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT DISTINCT source_type FROM literature_sources ORDER BY source_type ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM literature_sources;
SELECT author_name, source_title, published_year FROM literature_sources WHERE author_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY published_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM sources;
SELECT id, title, author, topic FROM sources WHERE published_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, author FROM sources WHERE topic = 'Technology' ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE source_id = 3;
SELECT source_id, review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT title, author, published_date FROM sources WHERE topic = 'Technology' ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT s.title, s.author, r.rating FROM sources s JOIN reviews r ON s.id = r.source_id WHERE r.rating > 4 ORDER BY r.rating DESC;
SELECT c.citation_text, s.title, s.author FROM citations c JOIN sources s ON c.source_id = s.id WHERE c.id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT s.title, count(r.id) as total_reviews FROM sources s LEFT JOIN reviews r ON s.id = r.source_id GROUP BY s.id ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT s.*, r.review_text FROM sources s JOIN reviews r ON s.id = r.source_id WHERE r.review_text LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY s.title ASC;
SELECT * FROM sources;
SELECT id, title FROM sources ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, title FROM sources WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT keyword FROM keywords WHERE keyword LIKE '%data%';
SELECT reviews.review_id, sources.title FROM reviews JOIN sources ON reviews.source_id = sources.id;
SELECT * FROM sources;
SELECT id, title, author FROM sources ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sources WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT s.title, r.review_id FROM sources s INNER JOIN reviews r ON s.id = r.source_id;
SELECT s.title, k.keyword FROM sources s LEFT JOIN keywords k ON s.id = k.id WHERE k.keyword='Technology';
SELECT * FROM Authors;
SELECT title, year_published FROM Books ORDER BY year_published DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT review_text FROM Reviews WHERE book_id = 3;
SELECT keyword_name FROM Keywords ORDER BY keyword_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT title, year_published FROM Books WHERE year_published > 2000 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, title FROM Authors JOIN Books ON Authors.author_id = Books.author_id;
SELECT author_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reviews FROM Reviews GROUP BY author_id HAVING num_reviews > 5;

SELECT Books.title, GROUP_CONCAT(Keywords.keyword_name) AS book_keywords FROM Books INNER JOIN BookKeywords ON Books.book_id = BookKeywords.book_id INNER JOIN Keywords ON BookKeywords.keyword_id = Keywords.keyword_id GROUP BY Books.title;
